name: OR_LOG_ALL_PROC
description: The OR_LOG_ALL_PROC table contains OR management system log procedures.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log referred to by this procedure.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of procedure in the surgical log.

columns.name: OR_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure.

columns.name: OR_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: The free text comments for this procedure.

columns.name: RESOURCE_PREF_ID
columns.description: Stores the procedure/preference id which was used to default resources (staff, equipment, etc.) corresponding to this procedure.

columns.name: RESOURCE_PREF_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: PICKLIST_PREF_ID
columns.description: Stores the procedure/preference id whose pick list was copied to create the corresponding pick list for this procedure in the case.

columns.name: PICKLIST_PREF_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: MATCHED_PREF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the preference card that has been selected to override the defaulted preference card.  NOTE: Starting in the Epic 2012 release, this column will display the ID of the selected preference card even though the column name says Matched Pref. The ID of the preference card that is matched or defaulted will be stored in I ORL 2018.

columns.name: MATCHED_PREF_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: DBC_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Stores the Diagnosis Behandling Combinatie (DBC) episode associated with the current procedure. Used in billing.

columns.name: PROC_EAP_ID
columns.description: Stores the ordered procedure (EAP) associated with the preference card.

columns.name: ALL_PROC_AS_ORDERED
columns.description: Denotes the procedure name as exactly ordered by the surgeon/provider.

columns.name: ALL_DEF_OR_PROC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the defaulted preference card.

columns.name: ALL_DEF_OR_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: ALL_PROC_CODE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the procedure (EAP) linked to the procedure code. This column is only populated for older surgical logs which were created and last modified before upgrading to the Epic 2018 version. For newer surgical logs, codes are in OR_OPE_PROC_CODE.PROC_CODE_ID.  OR_LOG_ALL_PROC joins to OR_OPE_PROC_CODE on column ALL_PANEL_ADDL_ID.

columns.name: PROC_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: This stores the procedure display name for the performed procedure based on the settings on the Procedure/Preference Card form in System Definitions.

columns.name: ALL_PROCS_INCISION_CLOSURE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the incision closure associated with the procedure.
entries: No Layers Closed / Incision Left Open

columns.name: ALL_PANEL_ADDL_ID
columns.description: Stores the pointer to the procedure additional data record for all panels.
